00055 /**
00056  * Controller parent class. 
00057  *
00058  * @category   ASOworx
00059  * @package    ASO
00060  * @copyright  Copyright (c) A Small Orange Software (http://www.asmallorange.com)
00061  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00062  */
00063 class ASO_Controller
00064 {
00065     /**
00066      * Application config
00067      * @var array
00068      */
00069     protected $config = array();
00070 
00071     /**
00072      * Processed input from ASO_Input::filter_input()
00073      * @var array
00074      */
00075     protected $input = array();
00076     
00077     /**
00078      * Database connection
00079      * @var ASO_Db_Astract
00080      */
00081     protected $db = array();
00082     
00083     /**
00084      * Current session data
00085      * @var array 
00086      */
00087     public $sess = array();
00088     
00089     /**
00090      * Error storage
00091      * @var ASO_Error
00092      */
00093     protected $error = null;
00094     
00095     /**
00096      * Session object
00097      * @var ASO_Session_Abstract 
00098      */
00099     protected $_session = null;
00100 
00101     /**
00102      * The base URL from the dispatcher
00103      * @var string
00104      */
00105     protected $baseURL = '';
00106     
00107     /**
00108      * The default method to run if none is specified
00109      * @var string
00110      */
00111     public $defaultMethod = 'main';
00112 
00113     /** 
00114      * Constructor
00115      *
00116      * Sets up the controller environment at the same time, including input filtering
00117      * and session access.
00118      *
00119      * @param array $config System configuration for setting up environment
00120      */
00121     public function __construct( $config )
00122     {
00123         // Verify that controller config is in an array.
00124         if( !is_array( $config ) )
00125             throw new ASO_Controller_Exception('Controller configuraion must be in an array');
00126 
00127         $this->_setEnvironment();
00128 
00129         $this->baseURL = $config['baseURL'];
00130         $this->config = $config;
00131 
00132         $input =& ASO_Registry('input');
00133         $input = $this->input =& ASO_Input::filterInput();
00134 
00135         $db =& ASO_Registry('db');
00136         $db = $this->db = ASO_Db::factory( $config['db_type'], $config );
00137 
00138         $this->_session = ASO_Session::factory( $config['session_type'],
00139                                                 array( 'db' => &$this->db,
00140                                                        'session_timeout' => $config['session_timeout'],
00141                                                        'session_domain' => $config['session_domain'],
00142                                                        'session_path' => $config['session_path'] ) );
00143         $sess =& ASO_Registry('sess');
00144         $sess = $this->_session->getData();
00145         $this->sess =& $sess;
00146 
00147         $error =& ASO_Registry('error');
00148         $error = $this->error = new ASO_Error( $this );
00149 
00150         $this->_loadPlugins();
00151 
00152         // Run the setup function, if defined
00153         $this->_setup();
00154     }
00155     
00156     /**
00157      * Runs any completion tasks after the controller event is dispatched
00158      * 
00159      * @return void
00160      */
00161     public function completeDispatch()
00162     {
00163         $this->errors = $this->error->getAll();
00164         $this->_session->saveSession( $this->sess );
00165     }
00166     
00167     
00168     /**
00169      * Redirects to another location.
00170      * 
00171      * @param string $location The location to redirect to
00172      * @return void
00173      */
00174     public function redirect( $location ) 
00175     {
00176         $this->_session->saveSession( $this->sess );
00177 
00178                 header( "Location: {$this->baseURL}$location" );
00179                 exit();
00180     }
00181 
00182     /**
00183      * Ensures a stable execution environment
00184      * 
00185      * @return void
00186      */
00187     protected function _setEnvironment()
00188     {
00189         error_reporting( E_ALL ^ E_NOTICE );
00190         if( version_compare( PHP_VERSION, '5.3.0', '<' ) )
00191             set_magic_quotes_runtime( 0 );
00192     }
00193     
00194     /**
00195      * Loads and initializes plugins in the app directory
00196      * 
00197      * @return void
00198      */
00199     protected function _loadPlugins()
00200     {
00201         $dir = opendir( './app/plugins/' );
00202         while( ( $file = readdir( $dir ) ) !== false) 
00203         {
00204             if( "." == $file || ".." == $file )
00205                 continue;
00206         
00207             if( preg_match( "/.*\.php/i", $file ) )
00208             {
00209                 require_once "plugins/$file";
00210                 $className = str_replace( '.php', '', $file );
00211                 if ( method_exists( $className, "init" ) )
00212                         call_user_func( $className.'::init' );
00213             }
00214         }
00215     }
00216     
00217     /**
00218      * Default setup function
00219      * 
00220      * @return void
00221      */
00222     protected function _setup() { }
00223     
00224     /**
00225      * Default callback for logging runtime exceptions.
00226      * 
00227      * Override this method in a subclass of ASO_Controller
00228      * to log this error to someplace other than
00229      * var/log/exceptions.log.
00230      * 
00231      * @param Exception $e The exception that was thrown at runtime
00232      */ 
00233     public function logException( $e )
00234     {
00235         $date = date( 'r' );
00236         $postVars = print_r($_POST, true);
00237         $sessionVars = print_r($this->sess, true);
00238         $serverVars = print_r($_SERVER, true);
00239         $message = <<<EXCEPTIONLOG
00240 ----------
00241 [ASOworx] Uncaught Exception:
00242 {$date}
00243 {$e->getMessage()} ({$e->getFile()}:{$e->getLine()})
00244 {$e->getTraceAsString()}
00245 
00246 Post: {$postVars}
00247 
00248 Session: {$sessionVars}
00249 
00250 Server: {$serverVars}
00251 EXCEPTIONLOG;
00252 
00253         $file = 'var/log/exceptions.log';
00254         if( file_exists( $file ) && is_writable($file) )
00255         {
00256             error_log($message, 3, $file);
00257         }
00258     }
00259     
00260     /**
00261      * Default callback for emailing runtime exceptions.
00262      * 
00263      * Override this method in a subclass of ASO_Controller
00264      * to change the default behavior.
00265      * 
00266      * @param Exception $e The exception that was thrown at runtime
00267      */ 
00268     public function emailException( $e )
00269     {
00270         if( !isset($this->config['email_exceptions_address']) )
00271         {
00272             throw new ASO_Controller_Exception( "Exception emailing turned on but no address specified.  Please specify \$CONFIG['email_exceptions_address'] in app/Config.php" );
00273         }
00274         
00275         $to = $from = $this->config['email_exceptions_address'];
00276         $subject = "[ASOworx] Uncaught Exception";
00277 
00278         $date = date( 'r' );
00279         $postVars = print_r($_POST, true);
00280         $sessionVars = print_r($this->sess, true);
00281         $serverVars = print_r($_SERVER, true);
00282         $message = <<<EMAILMESSAGE
00283 An uncaught exception occurred; here are the details:
00284 {$date}
00285 
00286 {$e->getMessage()} ({$e->getFile()}:{$e->getLine()})
00287 {$e->getTraceAsString()}
00288 
00289 Post: {$postVars}
00290 
00291 Session: {$sessionVars}
00292 
00293 Server: {$serverVars}
00294 EMAILMESSAGE;
00295     
00296         mail($to, $subject, $message, "From: {$from}\r\rX-Mailer: PHP/" . phpversion());
00297     }
00298     
00299 }
